doc.field: - Net 1986 profit 132.6 mln guilders vs 117.3 mln Turnover 1.6 billion guilders vs same Earnings per share 16.00 guilders vs 15.80 on capital expanded by 11 pct to 8.21 mln outstanding shares. Proposed dividend per share 5.50 guilders vs 5.00 Note - Full company name is Koninklijke Nederlandse Papierfabrieken NV.
